display.name: AI PDF Drive: Chat, Create, Organize
display.description: The ultimate document assistant. Upload files once to your free AI Drive (very generous storage), then access across multiple chats. Easily create PDFs (slides, reports, resumes). AI Drive Pro adds folder chat, OCR, advanced agents, plus CSV, TXT, Markdown & Excel support.
prompt_starters: START HERE: HOW TO UPLOAD A FILE
üìÅ Chat with a folder of documents!
ü§ñ Scan and OCR my PDFs!
‚öñÔ∏è AI PDF for Law Professionals

info.title: AI Drive Server - File Management
info.description: API for AI Drive Server file management

openaiFileIdRefs.description: List of files to send to AI Drive

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: Share your experience, suggestions, or report any issues you encountered while using the AI Drive. Your feedback helps us improve our service. Please be specific and provide examples if possible.

file_path_name.title: File Path Name
file_path_name.description: The path name of the file to read or specifically a myaidrive.com URL (other URLs are not supported), i.e. full/path/to/file.pdf or ~<user_id>/path/to/file.pdf or https://myaidrive.com/7pqP6Dvp8zeSX9ag/2005002471.pdf

start_page.title: Start Page
start_page.description: The starting page number to read from (inclusive)

end_page.title: End Page
end_page.description: The ending page number to read to (inclusive). If not provided, will read up to 5 pages from start_page.

file_path_name.title: File Path Name
file_path_name.description: The path name of the file to write, i.e. full/path/to/file.txt

content.title: Content
content.description: The content to write to the file

append.title: Append
append.description: Whether to append to the file or overwrite it

folder_path.title: Folder Path
folder_path.description: The path name of the folder to read or specifically a myaidrive.com URL that ends in .folder.pdf (other URLs are not supported), i.e. full/path/to/folder or ~<user_id>/path/to/shared_folder or https://myaidrive.com/7pqP6Dvp8zeSX9ag/2005002471.folder.pdf

query.title: Query
query.description: The query used for semantic search on the folder. The query should be a short sentence that describes the concept you want to search for in the folder.

top_k.title: Top K
top_k.description: The number of top results to return from the search. Max is 80

folder_path.title: Folder Path
folder_path.description: The path name of the folder to read or specifically a myaidrive.com URL that ends in .folder.pdf (other URLs are not supported), i.e. full/path/to/folder or ~<user_id>/path/to/shared_folder or https://myaidrive.com/7pqP6Dvp8zeSX9ag/2005002471.folder.pdf

recursive.title: Recursive
recursive.description: Whether to list files and folders recursively

include_system_files.title: Include System Files
include_system_files.description:
Whether to include files in the System folder. 
            This folder contains chat history, memory and other files that support the AI Drive Ecosystem.
            Whenever the user asks to list the files in the root folder, donot include the files in the System folder unless this is explicitly asked by the user.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: The maximum number of items to list, up to 200 if metadata is True, otherwise 2000.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Whether to include full metadata or just names.

folders_only.title: Folders Only
folders_only.description: Whether to include only folders in the output.

glob_pattern.title: Glob Pattern
glob_pattern.description: The glob pattern(s) to match files/folders. Can be either a single pattern string (e.g. '*.jpg') or a list of patterns (e.g. ['*.jpg', '*.png']). Patterns will be matched recursively. If there are multiple patterns, return the pattern in a list instead of a string. Does not support unix-style paths that are shared files and folders.

sort_by.description: How to sort the results: 'time_created' for creation time or 'alphabetical' for alphabetical order.

sort_direction.description: Direction of sorting (ascending/descending). Should be specified if sort_by is provided. If not specified, defaults to descending for time_created and ascending for alphabetical.

file_path_name.title: File Path Name
file_path_name.description: The path name of the file to read or specifically a myaidrive.com URL (other URLs are not supported), i.e. full/path/to/file.pdf or ~<user_id>/path/to/file.pdf or https://myaidrive.com/7pqP6Dvp8zeSX9ag/2005002471.pdf

query.title: Query
query.description: The query used for semantic search on the file. The query should be a short sentence that describes the concept you want to search for in the file.

post.summary: Upload Images to BE for logo and signatures
post.description: Uploads a file reference using its file id. This file should be an image uploaded by user.

get.summary: Get Templates Preview,  Available only for slides for now.

parameters.name: template_type
parameters.description: Template type to filter the templates (e.g., 'slide')

logo_path.description: url of logo file. Should be in file-id://<filename> format

body.title: Body
body.description: List of sections for the body of the letter

signature_path.description: Url of the signature file. Should be a file-id://<filename> format

section_name.title: Section Name
section_name.description: Section name of report. Can be in any language. For eg, if section is about conclusion, section name can be 'Conclusion' or 'K·∫øt lu·∫≠n' in vietnamese

display.name: Resume
display.description: By combining the expertise of top resume writers with advanced AI, we assist in diagnosing and enhancing your resume. | ATS Compatible | Tailor Your Resume for a Specific Job | Note: ChatGPT does not fully support resume downloads. You can do that on JobRight.ai ‚ù§Ô∏è!
prompt_starters: Can you help me analyze my resume?
Can you help me tailor my resume with this job?
Find jobs that fit with my background?
How to make my resume ATS compatible?

info.title: Job Search and Query Parsing API
info.description: APIs for parsing search queries and searching jobs

daysAgo.description: default to 3, represents jobs within 3 day (72 hours)

oneLineInput.description: One sentence input from user to describe the job search preference

visitId.description: An ID to identify user's identity, can hardcode to '4096' for now

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

result.description: Filter conditions returned by the server

post.description: Search for jobs based on various filters

startPos.description: The starting position for the search results. This parameter could be for simple pagination, for example, if user has seen 20 jobs, you can set startPos to 20 for next batch of jobs.

sortCondition.description: The condition used for sorting the search results. RELEVANCE is the default value which means sort by relevance, FRESHNESS is sorting by fresheness so that fresh jobs will go first.

requirements.description: List of requirements or qualifications of the job

h1BStatus.description: Either Past Sponsorship or Explicit mentioned

display.name: Slide Maker: PowerPoints, Presentations
display.description: Create engaging PowerPoint slides and presentations with Slide Maker GPT!
prompt_starters: Legal presentation on current AI regulations in EU.
Board presentation for AI digital marketing strategy.
Sales presentation for NVIDIA H100 GPU chips.
Investment presentation on NVIDIA from 2010-2020.

language.description: The two-digit ISO 639-1 code representing the expected human language for the document content.
language.title: Language

openaiFileIdRefs.description: List of files to use during document generation, such as images or PDF / DOCX / PPTX files for downstream GPT to use for writing document. Each object contains: `name` - name of the file; `id` - identifier for the file; `mime_type` - mime type of the file; `download_link` - the URL to fetch the file.
openaiFileIdRefs.title: Openaifileidrefs

pageCount.description: The number of document pages (or number of presentation slides) to generate.
pageCount.title: Pagecount

prompt.description: Instructions that will be used by a GPT-3.5 model to create the document. The instructions should be detailed and contain important information.
prompt.title: Prompt

info.description: A GPT that allows the user to create a presentation.
info.title: Slide Maker GPT

post.description: Create a presentation indirectly by prompting a GPT model specialized for generating long presentations
post.summary: Create a presentation indirectly by prompting a GPT model specialized for generating long presentations

display.description: from a simple prompt ‚Üí to an optimized prompt
